TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tomay, title = Tomay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomay} }

S.FORM: tomay tata'angay kora tomay O ta'angayay, micococay 'a'adopen a "LEY" ko tomay, o komaenay to titi a "MO". Ira ko tata'akay a tatirengan, cicediay a kamay ato oo', kakaya'ay a ngoso', kifetolay cifanohay a fanges, kamoko'ay a wikor. O kamay ato oo' no tomay i, ira ko ma'ikongay macidemay a kanoos, caay karecad to no posi a manga'ay a mahimed i kamay. O Pey-Ci-Syong hanany a tomay i, o komaenay to titi, nikaorira, ira ko komaenay to aol a tomay, o Ta-Maw-Syong hananay. O roma a tomay i, komaenay to maamaan, caay kapipili'.

tomay tata'angay kora tomay O ta'angayay, micococay 'a'adopen a "LEY" ko tomay, o komaenay to titi a "MO". Ira ko tata'akay a tatirengan, cicediay a kamay ato oo', kakaya'ay a ngoso', kifetolay cifanohay a fanges, kamoko'ay a wikor. O kamay ato oo' no tomay i, ira ko ma'ikongay macidemay a kanoos, caay karecad to no posi a manga'ay a mahimed i kamay. O Pey-Ci-Syong hanany a tomay i, o komaenay to titi, nikaorira, ira ko komaenay to aol a tomay, o Ta-Maw-Syong hananay. O roma a tomay i, komaenay to maamaan, caay kapipili'.
